Strings.Text:
In my opinion, I feel that it's too
early to use this, "Paracelsus'
Sword" in actual fighting. However,
in order to acquire the G-virus
that Umbrella has developed, it
will be a great help to us.

The power of the "Rail Cannon" is
satisfactory, but please note that
it is still having a few remaining
problems.

{right}Technology Division Colonel 
{right}Franklin Hart
